gameDetails.name: Oath: Clockwork Adversaries
gameDetails.description:
Explore a brand-new and fully-featured solo mode that adapts to you as you play it. Face a wide range of adversaries that will follow you from generation to generation as you attempt to guide the course of history


    Unlock solo-specific content and face challenges as Chancellor, Citizen, or Exile
    Easily jump between solo and multiplayer games
    Fully compatible with Oath and the upcoming New Foundations expansion


—description from the publisher
